page.title: 18TOURISM IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: Walking in Rossendale is very popular as there are lots of rambles. Dearden Moor is full of walking areas.If you like walking Rossendale is the place for you with its old mills the ski- slope and the old fashioned market.If you like hang-gliding there are lots of hills especially for you.Or if you are sporty there are parks which includes tennis,bowling and playgrounds.Weavers cottage has had many people living in it.{Maggie Allen Rawtenstall's well known{murderess and one of the last known woman to be executed at Strangeways jail( 1949) at the age of 42.She was a sad strange character who dressed in men's clothes and wore close cropped hair.Her victim was Miss{Nancy Ellen Chadwick aged 68 who was often dressed shabbily.
